title: Pixel Support in India
content: Bought Pixel in 2016 in India, For the last 6 months have faced battery drain issues and sent for repair through google support. They now say motherboard issue due to "wireless charge not functioning". The phone doesnt even have a wireless charge capability so how can this be a motherboard replacement issue. Anyways, i rejected the quotation and now they say  they have sent the phone back after taking the payment for battery replacement and NOT replaced the battery. They say they cant find the payment details. Not
